DataElement.preferredName: Patient Exclusion Criteria Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient has a diagnosis that meets the exclusion criteria for participating in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Exclusion Criteria Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Exclusion Criteria Diagnosis Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Medical and/or social characteristics that prevent a subject from being allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have anaplastic
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have anaplastic large cell lymphoma (ALCL), Natural Killer T-cell lymphoma Nasal Type (NKTCL), Anaplastic cutaneous large cell lymphoma (ACLCL) or lymphomatoid papulopsis?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have primary glioblastoma multiforme?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have clinically significant arrhythmia, including permanent atrial fibrillation, defined as continuous atrial fibrillation lasting for greater than or equal to 6 months; persistent atrial fibrillation, defined as sustained atrial fibrillation lasting more than 7 days and/or requiring cardioversion in the 4 weeks before screening; or grade 3 atrial fibrillation, defined as symptomatic and incompletely controlled medically, or controlled with a device (e.g., pacemaker) or by ablation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have non-secretory MM, plasma cell leukemia (i.e., greater than or equal to 20% plasma cells in peripheral blood differential or greater than or equal to 2,000/mcL circulating plasma cells), symptomatic primary AL amyloidosis, or POEMS syndrome (polyneuropathy, organomegaly, endocrinopathy, monoclonal protein, and skin changes)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have de-differentiated, mesenchymal, or clear cell chondrosarcoma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a diagnosis of NK cell lymphoma?

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/12/17 tt semantic edit to def. Curated to support EC9930
